title: MAG 170 - Recollection Transcript-converted
text:
distant. 
ARCHIVIST 
(Whisper) Okay. 
(Normal) Okay, good; I, I just… I wanted to make sure that you knew what this 
place was. 
MARTIN 
It's the Lonely, John. It's me. 
ARCHIVIST 
Not anymore. 
MARTIN 
Hm. No. (long inhale) No, not anymore. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS

Davies, and directed by Alexander J Newall. It featured: Alexander J Newall as 
Martin Blackwood and Jonathan Sims as The Archivist. To subscribe, buy
